recipe.title: Chocolate Mug Cake
recipe.ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, milk, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, salt
recipe.steps:
1. In a microwave-safe mug, add 4 tablespoons of all-purpose flour, 4 tablespoons of sugar, and 2 tablespoons of cocoa powder.
2. Add 1/8 teaspoon of baking powder and a pinch of salt. Mix well.
3. Pour in 3 tablespoons of milk, 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil, and 1/4 teaspoon of vanilla extract. Stir until smooth.
4. Microwave on high for 1 minute to 1 minute 30 seconds, until the cake has risen and is set in the middle.
5. Let it cool for a minute, then enjoy straight from the mug.

recipe.title: Garlic Butter Pasta
recipe.ingredients: spaghetti, butter, garlic, olive oil, salt, black pepper, parsley, parmesan cheese
recipe.steps:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions in salted boiling water until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water, then drain.
2. In a large pan, melt 2 tablespoons butter with 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat.
3. Add 3 minced garlic cloves and sauté for 1–2 minutes until fragrant.
4. Add the drained pasta to the pan and toss to coat in the garlic butter mixture.
5. Add a splash of reserved pasta water if needed to loosen the sauce.
6. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
7. Garnish with chopped parsley and grated parmesan cheese before serving.

recipe.title: Vegetable Fried Rice
recipe.ingredients: cooked rice, carrot, capsicum, green peas, onion, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, salt, black pepper, spring onions, oil
recipe.steps:
1. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
2. Add 2 cloves minced garlic and 1 diced onion, and sauté until translucent.
3. Add diced carrot, capsicum, and green peas; stir-fry for 3–4 minutes until tender but crisp.
4. Push the vegetables to the side and add the cooked rice.
5. Pour in 2 tablespoons soy sauce and 1 teaspoon vinegar; mix well.
6. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
7. Garnish with chopped spring onions before serving.
